                                    Thomas Zuppa Jr., Ward C

                                    Contact Info

                                    • phone(201) 547-5159
                                    • 280 Grove Street
                                      Room 207
                                      Jersey City, NJ 07302
                                    • Directions
                                     

                                    Ward C Councilperson Thomas Zuppa, Jr.

                                    Term of Office:
                                    First Elected To Council: Dec. 2, 2025 
                                    Current Term Expires: January 14, 2030

                                    (201) 547-5159
                                    TZuppa@jcnj.org

                                    Council Aide:
                                    (201) 547-5127

                                    Biography

                                    Tom Zuppa is an attorney practicing in labor and employment law and civil litigation. Before joining his firm, where Tom is a Partner, he served as an Assistant Prosecutor at the Hudson County Prosecutor's Office. Tom is a graduate of Fordham University and Seton Hall University School of Law. Tom is the standard bearer for the Tom Zuppa Civic Association, a non-profit organization, and the past president of the Journal Square Community Association, and is focused on building a more affordable and equitable Jersey City. Tom resides in the Journal Square neighborhood with his wife, Andrea, and their dog, Kennedy.
